Pix4D | C++ Engineers, UX Specialist, QA Engineer | Berlin | FULLTIME, ONSITE

Pix4D develops drone mapping and photogrammetry software that already enables tens of thousands of professionals around the world to create, visualize, assess and edit their own maps and 3D models.

We are opening a new office in Berlin, and at this point looking for multiple people: C++ and QA engineers, as well as a UX specialist. We will be working closely with Pix4Dâ€™s already existing development team in Lausanne, Switzerland, but will be focusing on new products.

- UX: Experience in sketching, wireframing, functional specifications and interactive prototypes

- QA: Experience in Python, developing tools for performance testing and automation of manual tests
